attributes.action: Publish Sue Gray’s enquiry into ‘Partygate’ in full, immediately
attributes.additional_details: I am sick and tired of honesty and truth being systematically removed from the accepted practice of our political institutions, in favour of party advantage, individual aggrandisement and naked self-interest. This country once had a reputation for standing up for the under-dog and for a sense of decency and fair-play. Whilst there is a lot of myth and romanticising in that, nonetheless, we must aspire to be better.
attributes.background: Require the report to be handed over in fill, immediately and the results to be debated fully in Parliament
